author: ASFN Admin
title: AP Source: Spurrier retiring from South Carolina (Yahoo Sports)
text: Posts: 54,243 AP Source: Spurrier retiring from South Carolina (Yahoo Sports) South Carolina coach Steve Spurrier has told his players that he is retiring, effective immediately. The person spoke to The Associated Press on condition of anonymity because South Carolina has not publicly announced Spurrier's decision. South Carolina has not named an interim coach but likely would announce someone to finish out the season by Wednesday, the person said.
